sent.orig: An enterprise driven by nature Nature that is relevant to modern living. Nature.
sent.trans: 一项被自然局势的伟大事业。一项有关线代生活的发现。自然。

sent.orig: But as we started to control nature, we saw ourselves above nature.
sent.trans: 可是我们开始控制自然，我们认为我们可以驾驭自然。

sent.orig: Firstly, Marx advanced humanized nature concept that removed from the opposition between human and nature.
sent.trans: 马克思提出了人化自然概念，消除了人与自然的对立。

sent.orig: Visit a nature preserve or area where you can experience nature near your home.
sent.trans: 参观自然保护区或者你家附近的绿地来体验自然。

sent.orig: Our purpose is not only to conquer nature but also to remake nature.
sent.trans: 我们的目的不仅要征服自然，而且还要改造自然。
